text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Sirius, do you remember the time 
we went camping?

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
How many years ago was that? 
I already long forgot.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Ah well, I simply felt like looking back
on old memories and found a picture of
us going through old albums.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
If I remember well…… you pulled me out 
of our tent, saying you wanted to watch 
the constellations.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
Stop making things up! You're the one 
who wanted to see the damn moon 
and dragged me out……!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hahah, maybe that's how it went. 
…… I'm glad you do remember.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
You just made me remember! Dang…… 
What's so good about the moon anyway……

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Its light guides everyone in the
darkness of the night…… The moon
represents exactly what I strive to be.
I told you about this back then, didn't
I? And I remember you were ——

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
I was looking at the stars. …… You don't
really need to tell me again.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Mm, I suppose you're right. You were
already looking at what you should be
aiming for.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
That first magnitude star burning in 
the night sky, etching its brilliant 
white light into the eyes of all since 
before the dawn of history ——

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: —— I'll burn down your moon for you, Ms. Emperor.
